item.description:
At our last meeting we agreed that some of us who are interested will see Jean-Paul Sartre's No Exit in the A.R.T. on January 18th Wednesday at 7:30 pm. The performance is in the Loeb Drama Center, located near Harvard Square at 64 Brattle Street, Cambridge, Massachusetts, USA.
(http://www.amrep.org/... )

I suggest that each of us buy tickets separately. (It would be probably difficult to buy 5-6 tickets next to each other anyway.) Tickets can be bought online and picked up just before the show at the box office. (Prices are $37 or $64 for B and A seats respectively). We plan to meet for an aftershow discussion. Let's meet both before and after the show in the theater lobby!
item.name: Jean-Paul Sartre's No Exit in the A.R.T
